heading: HB06794
0:
AN ACT DECLARING JULY 5 OF EVERY YEAR A SPECIAL NON-WORKING HOLIDAY IN
THE MUNICIPALITY OF BAMBANG, PROVINCE OF NUEVA VIZCAYA IN
COMMEMORATION OF ITS FOUNDING ANNIVERSARY TO BE KNOWN AS
“BAMBANG DAY”
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2020-06-03
